data.prayer: the state of Middle Caicos has (about) 64 people who know Jesus, 117 people who know about him culturally, and 19 people who are far from Jesus.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Middle Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, for all those you call to look after your flock from the 64 believers in Middle Caicos, please, make them passionate about hearing your Word.
data.verse: Therefore, you shepherds, hear the word of the LORD.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 3 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Middle Caicos hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.prayer: Father, answer the requests of your people in the state of Middle Caicos.
data.verse: This is the boldness which we have toward him, that, if we ask anything according to his will, he listens to us.

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Middle Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Middle Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the state of Middle Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.focus_label: Middle Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands

location.name: Middle Caicos
location.full_name: Middle Caicos, Turks and Caicos Islands
